p: The fraction of TEB-resistant isolates showed 90% overlap with ITR-resistant isolates, indicating that cross-resistance is the norm. However, in 10% of samples, cross-resistance between TEB and ITR was not observed. For example, in sample 89, the A. fumigatus population was ITR resistant while susceptible to TEB. In contrast, the A. fumigatus population in sample 21 was TEB resistant but ITR susceptible ( Fig. 2; see also Table S1).
